value.title: StarCraft 2: TOP-LEVEL SC2 IN 2023 - Dark vs Cure! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 between Cure (Terran) and Dark (Zerg). Cure has been playing very well over the last few months, and in this series he takes on one of the best Zerg players. value.title: StarCraft 2: TURTLE ROYALE! (Pro Gamer FFA)
value.excerpt: StarCraft 2 Battle Royale 6-man free-for-all between Maru, SuperNova, Taeja, Stats, Patience and Ragnarok.
